availability.p: This text may be freely distributed, subject to the following restrictions:

list.item: You credit Perseus, as follows, whenever you use the document: Text provided by Perseus Digital Library, with funding from The Annenberg CPB/Project. Original version available for viewing and download at http://www.perseus.tufts.edu/hopper/.
You leave this availability statement intact.
You use it for non-commercial purposes only.
You offer Perseus any modifications you make.

change.item: Made Speakers lower case;tagged lacunae; cut L N="0006" L N="012" from line 328, '†L N="32" from 870; removed some caps;

$Log: eur.el_murray_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.7 2013-09-13 11:21:33 balmas01 reverting texts back to pre_cts_reorg tagged version
Revision 1.5 2012-02-14 18:12:30 ajones06 Standardized and in a few cases added in header info.
Revision 1.4 2011-09-07 13:57:46 rsingh04 adding rend=displayNum to lb tags
Revision 1.3 2011-03-30 17:16:22 gcrane small fixes
Revision 1.2 2011-01-13 03:38:25 gcrane more refinements making these files SDL compatible
Revision 1.1 2010-12-25 19:01:41 gcrane our existing files but with L tags converted to LB milestones --
Revision 1.1 2009/11/23 18:46:35 rsingh04 moved more xml files around based on copyright status
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 21:15:27 packel removed stray item tags
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 14:33:42 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.9 2004/04/21 20:27:27 mimno added card 1s
Revision 1.8 2003/09/09 18:02:08 amahoney put spaces around em-dash entity so as not to confuse morphology stuff
Revision 1.7 2003/07/01 22:16:09 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.6 2000/03/04 20:34:32 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.5 2000/02/17 15:51:39 amahoney use n attribute on sp to carry over speaker names when long speeches are interrupted by card breaks -- and move card break past close tag of sp
Revision 1.4 1999/12/23 20:06:51 amahoney convert to P3

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.p:
su/ntein' — w(/ra — podo\s o(rma/n: w)/,
e)/mba, e)/mba kataklai/ousa:
i)w/ moi/ moi.
e)geno/man *)agame/mnonos
kai/ m' e)/teken *klutaimh/stra
stugna\ *tunda/rew ko/ra,
kiklh/skousi de/ m' a)qli/an
*)hle/ktran polih=tai.
feu= feu= sxetli/wn po/nwn
kai\ stugera=s zo/as.
w)= pa/ter, su\ d' e)n *)ai/+da
kei=sai, sa=s a)lo/xou sfagai=s
*ai)gi/sqou t', *)aga/memnon.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.p:
i)/qi to\n au)to\n e)/geire go/on,
a)/nage polu/dakrun a(dona/n.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.p:
su/ntein' — w(/ra — podo\s o(rma/n: w)/,
e)/mba, e)/mba, kataklai/ousa:
i)w/ moi/ moi.
ti/na po/lin, ti/na d' oi)=kon, w)=
tla=mon su/ggon', a)lateu/eis
oi)ktra\n e)n qala/mois lipw\n
patrw/|ois e)pi\ sumforai=s
a)lgi/staisin a)delfa/n;
e)/lqois tw=nde po/nwn e)moi\
ta=| mele/a| luth/r,
w)= *zeu= *zeu=, patri/ q' ai(ma/twn
e)xqi/stwn e)pi/kouros, *)/ar-
gei ke/lsas po/d' a)la/tan.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.p:
qe\s to/de teu=xos e)mh=s a)po\ krato\s e(-
lou=s', i(/na patri\ go/ous nuxi/ous
e)porqroboa/sw,
i)axa/n, *)ai/+da me/los,
*)ai/+da, pa/ter, soi
kata\ ga=s e)ne/pw go/ous
oi(=s a)ei\ to\ kat' h)=mar
die/pomai, kata\ me\n fi/lan
o)/nuxi temnome/na de/ran
xe/ra te kra=t' e)pi\ kou/rimon
tiqeme/na qana/tw| sw=|.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.p:
ai)= ai)=, dru/pte ka/ra:
oi(=a de/ tis ku/knos a)xe/tas
potami/ois para\ xeu/masin
pate/ra fi/ltaton kalei=,
o)lo/menon doli/ois bro/xwn
e(/rkesin, w(\s se\ to\n a)/qlion,
pa/ter, e)gw\ kataklai/omai,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
xai/rete: xai/rein d' o(/stis du/natai
kai\ cuntuxi/a| mh/ tini ka/mnei
qnhtw=n, eu)dai/mona pra/ssei.
